description:
This centre lock adapter allows the use of traditional 6-bolt disc brake rotors on a centre lock hub. No screws are needed to lock the rotor.

  • Made from CNC-machined aluminum
  • For Shimano® hub and IS 6-hole rotors only
  • For 15 and 20mm thru-axle hub
  • Sold singly
name: Alligator Center-lock Adapter 15/20mm
